name: Backrooms (alpha 0.1)
description:
This is an fangame of the backrooms.

I tried to make the levels as accurate as i can, as well as a bit originally.

Every time you load into the level, it generates randomly, which means you never know where the exit is and if its even there. (Spoiler: it is)

The exit of each level is a completely black, solid block. Touch it to proceed to the next level.

The pixelated effect gives the game a playstation 1 game vibe, and the sounds in the background make some cool effects on every level.

List of currently available levels:

-Level 0

-Level 1

-Level 2

Remember: This game is in  a VERY early stage of development (Which doesnt mean its not fun).

MAY CONTAIN BUGS (and probably is)
